task.title: How to install the software
task.shortdesc: Here's how to install the software on your computer.

taskbody.context:
This is a made-up example about how to install a software program on your computer.(The context should provide a brief background about the task, why they should do the task, and what to expect from the task. This section should not replace a DITA Concept file.)
The software has an easy to use installation wizard that does most of the hard work for you. What you'll need:
The installer. Download the software installer from our website at www.example.com
Your license key. The license key is unique to your username.
When you are ready, follow these steps to install the software on a Microsoft Windows computer: Installing the software takes about ten minutes on most computers.

step.cmd: Start the installer by double-clicking the Setup program icon.
Select the destination folder for the software.
step.info: By default, the destination folder will be C:\Program Files (x86)\The Software

taskbody.postreq: You will be prompted to enter your license key when you run the software for the first time.
